message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $160. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $110?
